text: â€œHo Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Tengban Mapugi wa phongdokpiba maichousingbu nahakna hatli aduga Tengban Mapuna nangonda thakhiba pao pubasingbu nungna thai! Yenbina machasingbu mathanungda konsinjabagum eina nanggi nachasingbu kayada toina konsinjaba pamjaramba! Adubu nahakna eingonda kolhankhide.
